title: Duplicate Container Information Alert
signals: container CMAU0000020; duplicate container information; PORTNET
summary: Customer reports receiving duplicate container information for container CMAU0000020 on PORTNET. The system should ensure unique container data to avoid confusion.
rationale: The test case involves container information duplication, which relates to container services.

title: Vessel Name Conflict Error
signals: VESSEL_ERR_4; vessel advice; MV Lion City 07; system vessel name
summary: Customer unable to create vessel advice for MV Lion City 07 due to error VESSEL_ERR_4 indicating the vessel name is already used by another vessel advice. The system should prevent duplicate vessel names in advice.
rationale: The test case concerns vessel advice and vessel name conflicts, fitting vessel-related services.

title: EDI Message Stuck in Error Status
signals: EDI message; REF -IFT-0007; ERROR status; acknowledgment; LINE -PSA; PSA -TOS
summary: An EDI message with reference IFT-0007 is stuck in ERROR status with no acknowledgment sent. The system should handle EDI message errors and ensure proper acknowledgments.
rationale: The test case involves an EDI message and its error status, which falls under EDI/API services.

title: Vessel BAPLIE Data Inconsistency
signals: MV PACIFIC DAWN/07E; BAPLIE inconsistency; COARRI; load completed; bay 14; Pasir Panjang Terminal 4
summary: Vessel MV PACIFIC DAWN/07E shows inconsistency between COARRI load completion and BAPLIE unit listings, with older timestamps regressing the plan. The system should resolve BAPLIE inconsistencies urgently.
rationale: The test case involves vessel data inconsistencies and COARRI messages, related to vessel services.
